conversation.message: PagerDuty paged me for spike in 5xx on checkout-api. Investigating logs.
Acknowledged. Infra shows rollout #6021 started 10 minutes ago.
Found error: upstream TLS handshake failure talking to payments-service.
Payments rotated certs at 12:55Z, new bundle missing intermediate.
Rolling back checkout-api deployment to previous image 2025.09.17.
Rollback done. Error budget burn stabilized, 5xx back under 1%.
Issued new cert with intermediate. Will stage fix after joint review.
